dcterms:description: A dataset used for generating high-resolution and low-resolution mosaic images from high-resolution multi-spectral cubes, taking into account the spatial offset of each wavelength in a multi-spectral pixel.
dcterms:title: StereoMSI dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset used for the PIRM2018 spectral super-resolution challenge, containing multi-spectral images for evaluating super-resolution methods.
dcterms:title: PIRM2018 spectral SR challenge dataset

dcterms:creator: Mehrdad Shoeiby
Antonio Robles-Kelly
Ran Wei
Radu Timofte
dcterms:description: An extended version of the StereoMSI dataset that includes additional data for generating low-resolution mosaic images from high-resolution images.
dcterms:title: Extended StereoMSI dataset
